events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Sofia, Bulgaria
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download theinfo, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started with Mobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE student Windows Azure six-month subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now.

events.name: SAP CodeJam Sofia
events.about:
Remember Hacker Night? Well, SAP is bringing it back under a new format calledCodeJam. This new concept offers an opportunity for you as a developer to not only get your hands on SAP’s latest technologies but also to put yourself to the test and to code, hack and create with your peers.

SAP CodeJam Sofia will focus on Cloud technologies. As a participant, you’ll get access to the SAP NetWeaver Cloud including tools, sandboxes, experts, and more! In the days prior to the event, youll receive an email with a checklist and a couple of links that will help you get prepared.

So, put yourself to the test and sign up for CodeJam Sofia now! The event is free, but space is limited.
